<!----> <meta itemprop="headline" content="发现一个Element-Plus 小工具，用起来不要太爽"> <meta itemprop="keywords" content="Element"> <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-21T14:06:04.000Z"> <meta itemprop="image" content="https://p1-jj.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-t2oaga2asx/gold-assets/icon/icon-128.png~tplv-t2oaga2asx-image.image"> <div itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><meta itemprop="name" content="苏格拉斯"> <meta itemprop="url" content="https://juejin.cn/user/1679709499301358"></div> <div itemprop="publisher" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="掘金"> <div itemprop="logo" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://p1-jj.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-t2oaga2asx/gold-assets/icon/icon-white-180.png~tplv-t2oaga2asx-image.image"> <meta itemprop="width" content="180"> <meta itemprop="height" content="180"></div></div> <h1 class="article-title" data-v-7cdd11fb="">
            发现一个Element-Plus 小工具，用起来不要太爽
            <!----> <!----></h1> <div class="author-info-block block-hidden" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="author-info-box" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="author-name" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><a href="/user/1679709499301358/posts" target="_blank" rel="" class="jj-link username username ellipsis" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><span class="name" style="max-width:160px;" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="">
    苏格拉斯
  </span> <!----> <!----> <!----> </a></div> <div class="meta-box" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><time datetime="2024-12-21T14:06:04.000Z" title="Sat Dec 21 2024 14:06:04 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)" class="time" data-v-7cdd11fb="">
                    2024-12-21
                  </time> <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="read-icon" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><path d="M7.90078 2.80078C4.49278 2.80078 1.74745 6.11672 0.800781 7.77469C1.74745 9.58339 4.49278 13.2008 7.90078 13.2008C11.3088 13.2008 14.0541 9.58339 15.0008 7.77469C14.0541 6.11672 11.3088 2.80078 7.90078 2.80078Z" stroke="currentColor" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></path><circle cx="7.89922" cy="8.00078" r="2.2" stroke="currentColor" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></circle></svg> <span class="views-count" data-v-7cdd11fb="">
                    15,025
                  </span> <span class="read-time" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><rect width="16" height="16" fill="none" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></rect><circle cx="8" cy="8" r="5.65625" stroke="#8A919F" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></circle><path d="M7.69141 5.18652V8.30924H10.8141" stroke="#8A919F" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></path></svg>
                    阅读3分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><h2 data-id="heading-0">前言</h2>
<p>一直以来我都被element-plus的from表单和table表格组件的开发困扰，每次改问题的时候就会发现组件一大堆表单代码，冗余太多了，然后又是不同开发者改。注释的代码，重复复制黏贴的代码。看着自己都头疼</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">新发现</h3>
<p>突然，前两天我在网上冲浪的时候发现了一个可以解决我困扰的问题，而且使用起来很方便，基本在element-plus项目中使用毫无违和感，而且撰写了使用文档，不得不说有点东西。</p>
<p>入口在这里 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Felement-plus-kit.netlify.app%2F" target="_blank" title="https://element-plus-kit.netlify.app/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">element-plus-kit</a></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">活不多说，上效果</h3>
<p>目前看了对应的文档，只有两个组件 <code>QForm</code> 和 <code>QTable</code>，但是用起来很清爽。而且作者目的很明确。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/6370537bd52940df89520d7601a57402~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6IuP5qC85ouJ5pav:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740207230&amp;x-signature=FSVdtVs6t31TdgQWu1BpZ2%2FS%2FQQ%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h4 data-id="heading-3"><code>QForm</code></h4>
<p>阅读文档发现，目前<code>QForm</code>支持了 <strong>19种组件</strong> ，我发现16种是<code>element-plus</code>官方组件表单型组件，另外作者还补充了三种常用的组件，</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/316023eb57b0449b84ba1afe9967166c~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6IuP5qC85ouJ5pav:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740207230&amp;x-signature=mbK8Hba4cBQkaNCutmsoN%2BSULOE%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h5 data-id="heading-4">使用效果</h5>
<ul>
<li>html 部分</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">QForm</span> <span class="hljs-attr">ref</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"formRef"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">label-width</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"125px"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:model</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"FormValue"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:form-options</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"formOptions"</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">:buttons</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"['search', 'reset', { label: '自定义提交按钮', type: 'submit' }]"</span> @<span class="hljs-attr">search</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"onSearch"</span>&gt;</span>
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span> #<span class="hljs-attr">customslot</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-avatar</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"https://cube.elemecdn.com/0/88/03b0d39583f48206768a7534e55bcpng.png"</span> /&gt;</span>
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">QForm</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>js 部分</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts" lang="ts">&lt;script setup lang=<span class="hljs-string">"ts"</span> name=<span class="hljs-string">"base"</span>&gt;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { ref } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"vue"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { <span class="hljs-title class_">QForm</span> } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@meetjs/element-plus-kit"</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> opts1 = [{ <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"选项1"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"1"</span> }, { <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"选项2"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2"</span> }];

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> opts = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>(opts1);
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> formRef = ref&lt;<span class="hljs-built_in">any</span>&gt;(<span class="hljs-literal">null</span>);
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">FormValue</span> = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>({
    <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"我爱你中国"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">count10</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"我是text"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">html1</span>: <span class="hljs-string">`&lt;font color="red" size="5"&gt;我是html&lt;/font&gt;`</span>
});
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> formOptions = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>([
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"input"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"输入框"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"name"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"textarea"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"文本域"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"textarea"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"input-number"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"数字输入"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count"</span>, },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"radio"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"单选框"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"sex"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">required</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">options</span>: opts.<span class="hljs-property">value</span>, },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"checkbox"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"多选框"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"checkbox"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">options</span>: opts.<span class="hljs-property">value</span>, },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"select"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"选择器"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"region"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">options</span>: opts.<span class="hljs-property">value</span>, },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"select-v2"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"虚拟化选择器"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count1"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">options</span>: opts.<span class="hljs-property">value</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"cascader"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"级联选择器"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count2"</span>, },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"tree-select"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"树形选择"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"treeSelect"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">options</span>: []},
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"time-select"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"时间选择"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count3"</span>, },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"slider"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"滑块"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count8"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"switch"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"开关"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count9"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"date-picker"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"日期(时间)选择器"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count4"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">attrs</span>: { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"datetime"</span> }, },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"time-picker"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"时间选择器"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count5"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"rate"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"评分"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count7"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"color-picker"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"颜色选择器"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count6"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"text"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"渲染文本"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"count10"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"html"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"渲染html"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"html1"</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"slot"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"自定插槽"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"customslot"</span>, },
]);

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">onSearch</span> = (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) =&gt; {
    <span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">FormValue</span>.<span class="hljs-property">value</span>);
};

&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>效果</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/11620a04807a4cfbbadccca32df84936~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6IuP5qC85ouJ5pav:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740207230&amp;x-signature=%2FLvb0gPVqV4um2HjcNI7tL4Dj50%3D" alt="Snipaste_2024-12-09_11-22-17.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>通过哐哐哐配置，好了，表单开发结束。而且，还支持栅格布局，表单检验，同时作者还细心的提供了很多配置示例。我觉得算是比较良心了 。</p>
<p>下面我们再来看看 <code>QTable</code> 组件。</p>
<h4 data-id="heading-5"><code>QTable</code></h4>
<h5 data-id="heading-6">先上效果</h5>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/3f4d90159d0d4b7eb6a1f4d4a7a59d55~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6IuP5qC85ouJ5pav:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740207230&amp;x-signature=%2FQvkk7CNq4i7muaiROhtYkpMHVE%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>接口效果，你会发现他的table 还支持了头部区域和分页区域，这样在开发过程中我们就不需要再单独处理分页和表格头部区域，直接使用的他的配置配置就OK了。</p>
<h5 data-id="heading-7">复杂配置</h5>
<p>我们看一个他官网比较完整的配置吧。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts" lang="ts">&lt;template&gt;
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">""</span>&gt;</span>
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">QTable</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:title</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"title"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:data</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"tableData"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:columns</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"columns"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">v-model:page</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"page"</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span> #<span class="hljs-attr">sex.header</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"{ row }"</span>&gt;</span>
                <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span> <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"small"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"warning"</span>&gt;</span>Sex<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span> #<span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"{ row }"</span>&gt;</span>
                <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span> <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"small"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">v-if</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"row.sex === 1"</span>&gt;</span>男<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span>&gt;</span>
                <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span> <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"small"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"danger"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">v-if</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"row.sex === 2"</span>&gt;</span>女<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- &lt;template #action&gt;
                &lt;el-button type="primary" size="small" text&gt;查看&lt;/el-button&gt;
                &lt;el-button type="primary" size="small" text&gt;编辑&lt;/el-button&gt;
                &lt;el-button type="danger" size="small" text&gt;删除&lt;/el-button&gt;
            &lt;/template&gt; --&gt;</span>
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">QTable</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
&lt;/template&gt;

<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">lang</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"ts"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">setup</span>&gt;</span><span class="xml">
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">""</span>&gt;</span>
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">QTable</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:title</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"title"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:data</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"tableData"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:columns</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"columns"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">v-model:page</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"page"</span>&gt;</span>
             <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span> #<span class="hljs-attr">headerRight</span>&gt;</span>
                <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-button</span> <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"primary"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"small"</span>&gt;</span>添加<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">el-button</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span> #<span class="hljs-attr">sex.header</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"{ row }"</span>&gt;</span>
                <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span> <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"small"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"warning"</span>&gt;</span>Sex<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span> #<span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"{ row }"</span>&gt;</span>
                <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span> <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"small"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">v-if</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"row.sex === 1"</span>&gt;</span>男<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span>&gt;</span>
                <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span> <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"small"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"danger"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">v-if</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"row.sex === 2"</span>&gt;</span>女<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">el-tag</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
            <span class="hljs-comment">&lt;!-- &lt;template #action&gt;
                &lt;el-button type="primary" size="small" text&gt;查看&lt;/el-button&gt;
                &lt;el-button type="primary" size="small" text&gt;编辑&lt;/el-button&gt;
                &lt;el-button type="danger" size="small" text&gt;删除&lt;/el-button&gt;
            &lt;/template&gt; --&gt;</span>
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">QTable</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">lang</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"ts"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">setup</span>&gt;</span><span class="javascript">
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { ref, h } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vue'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { <span class="hljs-title class_">QTable</span> } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'@meetjs/element-plus-kit'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { <span class="hljs-title class_">ElTag</span>, <span class="hljs-title class_">ElButton</span> } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'element-plus'</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> title = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'用户信息表'</span>)

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> page = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>({ <span class="hljs-attr">current</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">total</span>: <span class="hljs-number">30</span> })

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> tableData = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>([
    { <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'张三'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">age</span>: <span class="hljs-number">18</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">hobby</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'打游戏，看电影'</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'李四'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">age</span>: <span class="hljs-number">35</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">hobby</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'打游戏，看电影'</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'王五'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">age</span>: <span class="hljs-number">25</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">hobby</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'打游戏，看电影'</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'赵六'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">age</span>: <span class="hljs-number">16</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">hobby</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'打游戏，看电影'</span> },
    { <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'钱七'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">age</span>: <span class="hljs-number">23</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">sex</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">hobby</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'打游戏，看电影'</span> },
])

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> columns = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>([
    {
        <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'selection'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">align</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'center'</span>,
    },
    {
        <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'序号'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'index'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">align</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'center'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">60</span>
    },
    {
        <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">{ column, $index }</span>) =&gt;</span> {
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">h</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">ElTag</span>, {}, { <span class="hljs-attr">default</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-string">'姓名'</span> })
        }
    },
    {
        <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'age'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'年龄'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">align</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'center'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 使用 render-header可以使用，但控制台会报警告，官网建议使用 scoped-slot 代替 render-header，</span>
        <span class="hljs-string">'render-header'</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">{ column, $index }</span>) =&gt;</span> {
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">h</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">ElTag</span>, {}, { <span class="hljs-attr">default</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-string">'年龄'</span> })
        },
        <span class="hljs-attr">render</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">{ row, column, $index }</span>) =&gt;</span> {
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">h</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>, { <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>: { <span class="hljs-attr">color</span>: row.<span class="hljs-property">age</span> &gt; <span class="hljs-number">20</span> ? <span class="hljs-string">'green'</span> : <span class="hljs-string">'blue'</span> } }, { <span class="hljs-attr">default</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =&gt;</span> row.<span class="hljs-property">age</span> })
        },

    },
    {
        <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'sex'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'性别'</span>,
    },
    {
        <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hobby'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'爱好'</span>
    },
    {
        <span class="hljs-attr">prop</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'action'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">fixed</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'right'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">label</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'操作'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">150</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">render</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">{ row, column, $index }</span>) =&gt;</span> {
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">h</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'div'</span>, {}, [
                <span class="hljs-title function_">h</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">ElButton</span>, { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'primary'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'small'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">text</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> }, { <span class="hljs-attr">default</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-string">'查看'</span> }),
                <span class="hljs-title function_">h</span>(<span class="hljs-title class_">ElButton</span>, { <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'danger'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">size</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'small'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">text</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> }, { <span class="hljs-attr">default</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-string">'删除'</span> }),
            ])
        }
    },
])

</span></span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
</span></code></pre>
<p>效果图：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/2f4e806bcc6746f0a579771058be073c~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6IuP5qC85ouJ5pav:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740207230&amp;x-signature=H%2BT3No%2Bs58VOM5Vpnha7s48LvtA%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这一篇基本都满足了我日常开发所有的困惑或者使用案例。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">最后</h2>
<p>用作者一句话：<strong>简单，灵活，高效。不信你试试</strong></p></div></div>
